Actions.Name: When a pre-defined event happened
Actions.Description: Creates a new webhook for pre-defined callback content type event.

Actions.Name: When a resource is published
Actions.Description: Creates a new webhook for publish event.

Actions.Name: When a resource is validated
Actions.Description: Creates a new webhook for completion of any scoring event.

Actions.Name: Run step
Actions.Description: Executes the step with the specified input values. The outputs variable in the reply contains the output of the execution.
